metadata.title: CVE-2020-25623 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Erlang/OTP 22.3.x before 22.3.4.6 and 23.x before 23.1 allows DirectoryTraversal. An attacker can send a crafted HTTP request to read arbitraryfiles, if httpd in the inets application is used.

criterions.comment: erlang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
